caption:
Bengal trio in India A squad for England tour 

Bengal’s Abhimanyu Easwaran, Mukesh Kumar and Akash Deep have been named in the India A squad for the upcoming tour of England starting on May 30.

Easwaran has been named the captain of India A team. India A will play two first-class matches against the England Lions at Canterbury and Northampton. 

The tour will conclude with a match against Team India (Senior Men).

India A squad: Abhimanyu Easwaran (C), Yashasvi Jaiswal, Karun Nair, Dhruv Jurel (VC) (WK), Nitish Kumar Reddy, Shardul Thakur, Ishan Kishan (WK), Manav Suthar, Tanush Kotian, Mukesh Kumar, Akash Deep, Harshit Rana, Anshul Kamboj, Khaleel Ahmed, Ruturaj Gaikwad, Sarfaraz Khan, Tushar Deshpande, Harsh Dubey.
 Shubman Gill and Sai Sudharsan will join the squad ahead of the second match.

#CAB
